title: General Above I am Below - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Androgynous Characters   Arranged Marriage   Cold Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Cross-dressing   Female Protagonist   Military   Politics   Royalty   Strong Love Interests
author: Ju Hua San Li   橘花散里
description:
Triumphantly back from eight years at the battlefront, the great general of the nation’s armies turns out to be a woman! 

Per the Empress Dowager’s decree: Prince An’s younger brother Xia Yujin, now granted the title of prince of Nanping, is to marry the general.

Now facing a ferocious, iron-willed, and ruthless wife, this hedonistic prince’s only recourse, in this cold and harsh winter, is to dissolve into tears and desperately cry out for help: “How can I uphold the traditional authority of a husband over his wife?”>
